text: The volleyball tournaments at the 2016 Summer Olympics in Rio de Janeiro were played between 6 and 21 August. Twenty-four volleyball teams and 48 beach volleyball teams, totalling 386 athletes, participated in the tournament. The indoor volleyball competition was held at Ginásio do Maracanãzinho in Maracanã, and the beach volleyball tournament took place at Copacabana Beach. == References == ==Other websites== *Volleyball qualification process *Beach volleyball qualification process *Volleyball qualification website *Beach Volleyball qualification website Category:2016 Summer Olympics Category:Volleyball
title: Volleyball at the 2016 Summer Olympics
